item.title: 数据显示，法国从俄罗斯进口的液化天然气增至年度最高纪录
item.description: 法国从俄罗斯进口的液化天然气激增至创纪录水平。【原文：France’s imports of liquefied natural gas from Russia have surged to a record.】

item.title: 小米业绩超预期，电动汽车风头正劲
item.description: 小米公司（Xiaomi Corp. ）的季度收入超过了分析师的预期，因为这家智能手机公司在今年 3 月进入的竞争激烈的电动汽车领域获得了一席之地。【原文：Xiaomi Corp.’s quarterly revenue exceeded analyst expectations as the smartphone company gained a foothold in the cutthroat electric vehicle sector it entered in March.】

item.title: 快递英雄希望从塔拉巴特公司首次公开募股中获利约 15 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Delivery Hero SE 正在考虑从其位于迪拜的中东业务部门的首次公开募股中寻求约 15 亿美元的资金。【原文：Delivery Hero SE is considering seeking about $1.5 billion from the initial public offering of its Middle Eastern unit in Dubai, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲落后，爱立信首席执行官寻求在美国实现增长
item.description: 欧洲是全球最薄弱的电信市场之一。爱立信公司首席执行官 Börje Ekholm 表示，除非政策制定者鼓励进行更多整合并减少监管，否则公司将继续把投资转向海外市场。【原文：Europe is one of the weakest telecom markets in the world. And unless policymakers encourage more consolidation and cut regulation there, Ericsson AB Chief Executive Officer Börje Ekholm said his company will continue to shift investments to markets abroad.】

item.title: 特朗普不可能完成的任务：为工薪阶层和亿万富翁提供服务
item.description:
他试图推行财阀民粹主义，但算盘打得不响。【原文：

He’s attempting to pull off plutocratic populism, but the math doesn’t square.

】

item.title: 盈利季面临重大考验：零售商的假日展望
item.description: 上周的大跌是紧随美国企业普遍成功的财报季之后发生的，投资者正准备迎接最后的考验：一系列零售业风向标将在未来几天发布报告，对消费者状况进行解读。【原文：Last week’s selloff, which comes on the heels of what has been a generally successful earnings season for Corporate America, has investors bracing for one final test: a reading on the state of the consumer from a series of retail bellwethers who report in the coming days.】

item.title: 法国农民动员起来阻止欧盟的南方共同市场贸易协定
item.description: 法国强大的农业工会再次走上街头，寻求政府更多的支持，并集会反对欧盟与拉美生产商达成的自由贸易协议，该协议被认为允许更廉价的商品进入法国。【原文：France’s powerful farming unions are taking to the streets again to seek more government support and rally against a European Union free trade deal with Latin American producers seen allowing in cheaper goods.】

item.title: Raiffeisen 提供因与俄罗斯的联系而于 3 月撤消的 AT1 协议
item.description: Raiffeisen Bank International AG 正试图筹集新的资本，以置换额外一级债券，在此之前的一次交易因该银行努力退出其俄罗斯业务而失败已过去了六个多月。【原文：Raiffeisen Bank International AG is trying to raise new capital to replace an Additional Tier 1 bond more than six months after an earlier deal failed due to the lender’s struggle to exit its Russian operations.】

item.title: 奈德银行计划以 6.62 亿美元战利品拓展非洲市场
item.description: 奈德银行集团（Nedbank Group Ltd.）正着手在非洲大陆重塑自我，希望在未来十年内减少对南非的依赖，并将从其他非洲市场获得的利润增加近四倍。【原文：Nedbank Group Ltd. is setting out to reinvent itself across the African continent as it looks to reduce its dependence on South Africa and nearly quadruple its profit from other African markets over the next decade.】

item.title: 华尔街著名熊市投资者威尔逊设定美股看涨目标
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）策略师迈克尔-威尔逊（Michael Wilson）近年来以看跌美国股市而闻名，但他对 2025 年的美国股市却持完全看涨的观点。【原文：Morgan Stanley strategist Michael Wilson, well known for his bearish views on US equities in recent years, has an outright bullish outlook for 2025.】

item.title: 骗子如何骗取政府数十亿美元
item.description:
埃隆-马斯克，请收听本期节目。【原文：

Elon Musk, listen to this episode.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：欺诈如何让政府损失数十亿美元（播客）
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在获胜后宣布，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）和维维克-拉马斯瓦米（Vivek Ramaswamy）将领导一个新的政府效率部（Department of Government Efficiency），以打击联邦政府内部的浪费和欺诈行为。姑且不论这项工作的成效如何，打击浪费和追捕欺诈者的基本前提一般来说应该是没有争议的。那么，欺诈是什么样的？公司是如何诈骗医疗保险和医疗补助等项目的？【原文：After his victory, Donald Trump announced that Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy would be leading a new Department of Government Efficiency in order to crack down on wasteful, fraudulent spending inside the federal government. Setting aside the question of how effective this particular endeavor will be, the basic premise of cracking down on waste and going after fraudsters should generally be non-controversial. So what does fraud look like? How do companies bilk programs like Medicare and Medicaid f】

item.title: 到 2025 年底，巴基斯坦股票指数可能至少上涨 27%：分析师
item.description: 据两家经纪公司称，随着巴基斯坦经济在国际货币基金组织的贷款计划下有所改善，且货币趋于稳定，预计到明年年底，巴基斯坦股市将上涨四分之一以上。【原文：Pakistan’s stocks are expected to advance by more than a quarter by the end of next year as the nation’s economy shows improvement under loan program with the International Monetary Fund and the currency stabilizes, according to two brokerage houses.】

item.title: 小米亿万富翁再次提高电动汽车目标以示信心
item.description: 小米公司现在的目标是在 2024 年交付 13 万辆电动汽车，将目标提高了 8%以上，以显示对这一新兴业务的信心。【原文：Xiaomi Corp. is now aiming to deliver 130,000 electric vehicles in 2024, raising its target by more than 8% in a show of confidence in the fledgling business.】

item.title: 欧洲央行金多斯警告高额政府债务带来的危险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）警告说，高水平的主权债务可能会阻碍各国政府应对长期经济挑战，并使其陷入低增长。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos warned that high levels of sovereign debt could prevent governments from addressing long-term economic challenges and consign them to low growth.】

item.title: ICE 称，尽管发行量存疑，欧盟债券期货仍将取得成功
item.description: 洲际交易所（Intercontinental Exchange Inc）的一位高管表示，欧盟债券多年来将继续在市场中发挥重要作用，并驳斥了人们对该集团作为主要发行人的长期地位的担忧。【原文：European Union bonds will continue to play an important role in markets for years, according to an Intercontinental Exchange Inc executive, rebuking concerns over the bloc’s long-term status as a major issuer.】

item.title: KBW 称德国商业银行股价将因联合信贷交易而上涨 35
item.description: 据 KBW 分析师称，如果德国商业银行股份公司（Commerzbank AG）被意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）收购，其股价可能会飙升 35%。【原文：Commerzbank AG shares could surge as much as 35% if the German lender is taken over by Italian bank UniCredit SpA, according to analysts at KBW.】

item.title: 交易员权衡特朗普政策和中国因素，欧洲股市暂停上涨
item.description: 由于对唐纳德-特朗普政策的担忧以及中国股市未能守住盘中涨幅，欧洲股市周一持稳。【原文：European stocks were steady on Monday amid worries around Donald Trump’s policies and after stocks in China failed to hold onto intraday gains.】

item.title: 中国人口将减少 5100 万，因为支持生育的行动失败了
item.description: 据彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）称，随着决策者努力扭转中国出生率下降的趋势，预计未来十年中国人口将减少 5100 万，超过加利福尼亚州的面积。【原文：China’s population is expected to shrink by 51 million — more than the size of California — over the next decade as policymakers struggle to reverse the country’s falling birth rate, according to Bloomberg Intelligence.】

item.title: 印度金属巨头有望从中国取消出口退税中获益
item.description: Hindalco Industries Ltd. 董事总经理 Satish Pai 表示，希望从中国取消铝和铜出口退税的举措中获益。【原文：Hindalco Industries Ltd. hopes to benefit from China’s move to cancel tax rebates on exports of aluminum and copper, Managing Director Satish Pai said.】

item.title: 津巴布韦因 ZiG 下降影响预算而削减部分支出项目
item.description: 津巴布韦货币贬值迫使政府削减某些预算项目的开支。【原文：Zimbabwe’s currency devaluation is forcing the government to cut spending on certain budget items.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长纳格尔警告经济分化风险正在升级
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）认为，全球经济有可能进一步分化，这可能会给各国央行带来新的挑战，即更高或更不稳定的通货膨胀。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Joachim Nagel sees the threat of a further fragmentation of the global economy, which could present central banks with new challenges in the form of higher or more volatile inflation.】

item.title: 毛里求斯总理下令审查 "错误 "的国库数据
item.description: 毛里求斯新任总理下令对财政部的数据进行审计，他说这些数据显示毛里求斯的经济状况比实际情况要好。【原文：Mauritius’s new premier ordered an audit of Finance Ministry data that he said shows the economy is doing better than it actually is.】

item.title: 新加坡石油大亨 OK Lim 被判处 17 年半监禁
item.description: 新加坡石油大亨林翁权（Lim Oon Kuin）因欺骗汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）和唆使伪造证件而被判处 17 年半监禁，此案震动了新加坡商品交易界，并给银行造成了巨大损失。【原文：Singapore oil tycoon Lim Oon Kuin has been sentenced to 17 and a half years in jail for cheating HSBC Holdings Plc and instigating forgery in a case that has shaken the city-state’s commodity-trading community and left banks nursing hefty losses.】

item.title: 不温不火的欧洲季度收益阻碍了 2025 年经济复苏的希望
item.description: 欧洲公司的收入在第三季度未能恢复，导致明年的盈利预期被下调。【原文：Revenue at European companies failed to recover in the third quarter, triggering cuts to earnings expectations into next year.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市在经历 6 月以来最差单周走势后将迎来反弹
镍矿商普罗尼计划重启新喀里多尼亚生产
item.description: 新喀里多尼亚镍矿开采商普罗尼资源公司（Prony Resources New Caledonia）已让员工返回现场，准备在法国领土暴乱引发的六个月停产后重新开始产出。【原文：Nickel miner Prony Resources New Caledonia has brought its staff back onsite as it prepares to restart output after a six-month suspension triggered by riots in the French territory.】

item.title: 聚合招聘在日本八月震荡中受伤的 BlueCrest 经理
item.description: 聚合资本管理公司（Polymer Capital Management）聘用了高级投资组合经理村山千贺（Chiga Murayama），村山千贺在 8 月份市场波动导致日元汇率交易商普遍亏损后离开了蓝冠资本管理公司（BlueCrest Capital Management）。【原文：Polymer Capital Management has hired Chiga Murayama, a senior portfolio manager who left BlueCrest Capital Management after market swings led to widespread losses among yen rates traders in August.】

item.title: 肯特称澳大利亚央行的政策效应并不比其他经济体强
item.description: 一位储备银行高级官员表示，尽管澳大利亚家庭背负着大量浮动利率抵押贷款债务，但其货币政策效应并不比其他发达经济体更强。【原文：Australia’s monetary policy effect is no more potent than those of other advanced economies, even though its households carry a large stock of variable-rate mortgage debt, a senior Reserve Bank official said.】

item.title: 碧昂斯将加入 Netflix 的 NFL 首秀，为推动大型活动运筹帷幄
item.description: 碧昂斯（Beyoncé）将在 Netflix 公司今年圣诞节首次进军美国橄榄球联盟（NFL）比赛直播期间的中场表演中担任主角，这对于一家在体育直播和大型活动方面下了大赌注的美国公司来说是一个重大收获。【原文：Beyoncé will headline the halftime show during Netflix Inc.’s maiden foray into live NFL games this Christmas, a big score for a US company betting big on live sports and mega-events.】
